body: Part 3 fck BS, She says sorry for decieeving everyone, Girl you just wanted to play too, what's wrong with that, the Sorry ass guy, should just get tortured like you rlly expect a fcking APOLOGY to fix that, Guy like wtf, even more MC why tf was he just watching them, dude has no fcking balls whatsoever, Overall just, read the Part ! of Ideal Batterry because parts 2 & 3  are complete BS, Man it was already good,  but when part 2 came, Instantly became BS, just my advice tho, if you want to still read it go ahead

This was good until the second part, Good end? nah it's bullsh*t, Dude blackmailed and raped the girl and expects a FCKING APOLOGY to fix it,  They really ruined it, it was really good, IF they only did not add that Blackmailed Part instead it was hachiman's kink, where he put vibrator in her, instead of blackmailing. Art is good aswell as the first part, but Man did you guys manage to ruin it so bad, This is the same sht as itadaki seiki, both wouldve beenn good without the rapey scenes,  anyways whoever wants to read this, SKip ideal batterry 2 or possibly 3, Only the part 1 was the best one, number 2 was BS, number 3 Waas more of A BS,

Holy sit so there was a good ending this whole time,?
And here I was waiting for 7 fucking years for part 3 when it was hidden in a whole volume... 
Welp, I'm finally satisfied

Pg 185 "I want to tell you something once this match is over." , "I'll definitely win so make sure you support me." bruh. This character is suicidal with those death flags.  Also, if Nagase Hiro is not BSing her, the exchange between Shimokawa and Nagase is one of the most level-headed, rational and productive confrontations I've ever read in H-manga. Both characters acted maturely and handled the situation like adults which is a pleasant surprise. Excellent job by the author.

Then another dude finds out and forces her to do stuff, which she complies with since she wants to stay on the team with the one she loves. Then he tries to make her have sex with him and honestly it turns into a rape since she's not willing, the dude she loves turns up but doesn't do shit to help her, get's spotted and the dude raping shows it while feeling smug. Then the girl after this leaves since she can't stay in the team with her being a girl then later on they get together again and becomes a couple. Srsly though I have no idea why the dude didn't help her out or why the girl seems okey with having been raped and just forgives the rapist.
